attributes.title: useless
attributes.review: i was hoping that i’ll be able to support my president by attending rallies that would be notified within the app but there wasn’t. also there are many ads that keep popping up on my screen and it annoying.  the app keeps crashing and overall is just not the best in my opinion. now i was excited to see there was finally a app where i could obsess unhealthily over a orange man but it didn’t fulfill my needs 😡

attributes.title: trauma
attributes.review: i wanted to download this app to support our amazing, gorgeous looking president but the moment i opened the app, my bed collapsed and i hit my hip so hard i had to get a surgery right away.  my 69 year old self had to go through a severe trauma and i truly believe it is because of this app!!! i believe this app is cursed and is trying to stop us from loving our president!!! now because of that i had to delete the app and recommend others do the same.

attributes.title: Great App!
attributes.review: Don’t listen to the Never Trump Trolls giving  one star, if you love Trump you’ll love this app.

attributes.title: Ew just Ew
attributes.review: This app is absolutely outrageous. I can not believe that people actually download this app for use. This app is cursed. My phone started glitching the second I downloaded it and now it won’t work properly. This app needs to be deleted asap.

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: Full of technical glitches and very poorly made! As a fellow trump supporter, I was fully expecting this app to be amazing (like our wonderful president 😻) but it was totally trash. I’m totally not saying this because of a certain gen z motive, I would never!! I love my president. 🤢

attributes.title: GLITCHY
attributes.review: As soon as I open the app it closes me out. I restarted me phone after clearing out the app didn’t help and it still won’t let me access the app. It definitely has a bug, very glitchy and won’t work.

attributes.title: Ew
attributes.review: This was really just a horrendous app and I think that if any trump supporter were to download this I would not recommend because it just gives false information and not accurate description of America

attributes.title: ew
attributes.review: you gave an idiot an app, what’d you expect??? anyway, if i could give this no stars i most definitely would. my dog saw the app on my phone and IMMEDIATELY set on fire like???? how does that work, ANYWAY yeah, this whole app was a terrible idea, you should’ve known from the owners name 🤮. okayy byeeeee - gen z’er

attributes.title: Bad quality and taste
attributes.review: I 🤚couldn’t🚫 find👀 the flavor👄 in this, 👁👄👁like where is the flavor in this✨, and can you tell me who the hell 🔥put the muffins🧁in the freezer! Like that app was something else I dont recommend. When I opened the app my eyes went ↖️↗️↘️↙️⬅️🔄

attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: I tried to open the app but it kept kicking me out so I deleted it and reinstalled it! It let me in but then it showed some Cheeto puff with a wig on! I was disappointed about this app and it’s disgusting that Donald Trump allows this! 1 star he is the worst just like this app!😡😡🤬🤬👎👎😾👿👿🤡🤡🙄🙄😑😑😤😤
